name: Judge Of Hasoon
description:
It is a mystery game against a medieval fantasy background in which the main character solves various events that take place in "Hasoon."
It consists of four episodes, with options to solve the case and play the game.
Get to the truth by solving several incidents in rural villages.

All proceedings are made through dialogue between the characters. Find contradictions in the character's words and solve the case.

* In addition to the information in the game, it requires some common sense.
